sentences.sContent: Destroy the people's faith in their natural leaders by holding the latter up to contempt, ridicule and obloquy.
sentences.sContent_eng: Destroy the people's faith in their natural leaders by holding the latter up to contempt, ridicule and obloquy.
sentences.sCn: 摧毁人民对他们当然领袖的信仰，代之以轻蔑、嘲笑和漫骂。

remMethod.val: ob(反) + loqu(说话) + y → 说坏话 → 辱骂
